member.name: M:Alternet.Syntax.Parsers.TextMate.TextMateParser.ResetOptions
member.summary: Resets Options to the default value.

member.name: M:Alternet.Syntax.Parsers.TextMate.TextMateParser.ShouldSerializeOptions
member.summary: Indicates whether the Options property should be persisted.
member.returns: True if Options differs from its default value; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Alternet.Syntax.Parsers.TextMate.TextMateParser.ShouldSerializeUseScheme
member.summary: Indicates whether the UseScheme property should be persisted.
member.returns: True if UseScheme differs from its default value; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Alternet.Syntax.Parsers.TextMate.TextMateParser.InitIndentationRules(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes indentation rules with the new values.
member.param: If line of code matches this expression, indentation level is increased when new line is inserted after.
If line of code matches this expression, indentation level is decreased when new line is inserted after.
If line of code matches this expression, indentation level does not change.

member.summary: Represents collection of images used for code completion.
